title: JAM / MONUMENT REFLECTION
description: After the Tribunal, Harry reflects on the re-conceptualization of the horseback monument by Idiot Doom Spiral. (ULTRALIBERAL DREAM QUEST)

dialogueTree.title: Horseback Monument: "A cardboard sign hangs from the arm..."
dialogueTree.text: A cardboard sign hangs from the arm pointing out to sea. Written in shaky marker pen are the words: 'PALE SWALLOWS ALL'. What was once a gesture of great power has been hijacked to signal the ceaseless march of annihilation.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hard to disagree with the sentimen..."
links.text: "Hard to disagree with the sentiment considering what we just survived." The lieutenant solemnly looks toward the plaza, then turns to you.

links.title: Half Light: "Look -- up there! It is he who sire..."
links.text: Look -- up there! It is he who sirens. Syntagmatarchis Trypa! Here, upon us, to warn of the mangy jowls of The Gloaming.

links.title: Logic: "Has The End not already come? Stone..."
links.text: Has The End not already come? Stones were wetted, bloods were coughed, the locals cast under greater shadow. Is this not inappropriate when tribute should instead be placed?

links.title: Authority: "Citizens must be warned. This is no..."
links.text: Citizens must be warned. This is not only a declaration of the dead but a warning for those still alive. It comes, indomitably.

links.title: You: ""This is only the beginning." (Grin..."
links.text: "This is only the beginning." (Grin wickedly.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," the lieutenant clears his th..."
links.text: "Khm," the lieutenant clears his throat, keen to move on.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, I have a few questions..."
links.text: "Detective, I have a few questions if you don't mind..."

links.title: You: ""About what?""
links.text: "About what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""About this... pursuit of wealth......"
links.text: "About this... pursuit of wealth... pursuit of recognition." He looks up, trying to find a name for your actions.

links.title: You: ""No, I don't mind.""
links.text: "No, I don't mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods, eyes still on the doom cri..."
links.text: He nods, eyes still on the doom crier above, on the arm holding out the portent in the cold air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why did you do it?""
links.text: "Why did you do it?"

links.title: Shivers: "A figure in a day dress, cuddled up..."
links.text: A figure in a day dress, cuddled up in an armchair... she looks up and smiles at you across the living room.

links.title: You: ""To win her back.""
links.text: "To win her back."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who?" The lieutenant meets your ey..."
links.text: "Who?" The lieutenant meets your eyes with a questioning glance -- then looks up again.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, who are you talking about?"
links.text: Yes, who are you talking about?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's talking about pussy. Our guy's..."
links.text: He's talking about pussy. Our guy's gonna be *swimming* in it now that he's loaded!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Never mind. Another question -- wa..."
links.text: "Never mind. Another question -- was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""I wanted better for myself.""
links.text: "I wanted better for myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The doom crier waits to be swallowed by the bright sky, his cardboard omen flapping in the wind like live bait...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Honest. Maybe even *too* honest......"
links.text: Honest. Maybe even *too* honest... Didn't we talk about giving back to the community?

links.title: Endurance: "Nothing wrong with raw ambition."
links.text: Nothing wrong with raw ambition.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And was it all worth it?""
links.text: "And was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You managed to gather quite a fort..."
links.text: "You managed to gather quite a fortune, kicked off by underpaying a young artist..."

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying......"
links.text: And don't forget about the lying... or the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying..."
links.text: And don't forget about the lying...

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the way you..."
links.text: And don't forget about the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You *had to* pay her so little, oth..."
links.text: You *had to* pay her so little, otherwise you wouldn't have made any profit -- and if you don't make a profit, you don't have money to invest!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The lieutenant speaks as if you're..."
links.text: The lieutenant speaks as if you're *rich* -- a common misconception -- especially if you count the tax. No, we've got a long way to go before we can feel financially comfortable. The hustle never stops!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? But you paid the highe..."
links.text: Underpaying? But you paid the highest possible price!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? You paid according to..."
links.text: Underpaying? You paid according to the market -- not too much, not too little...

links.title: You: ""100% worth it. I'd do it all over..."
links.text: "100% worth it. I'd do it all over again -- but this time with more *profit*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true busines..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true businessman." He smiles gently.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, shall we? We still have s..."
links.text: "Alright, shall we? We still have some things left to do before we can go home."

links.title: You: ""Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom..."
links.text: "Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom Spiral first."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think we have time for tha..."
links.text: "I don't think we have time for that. And even if we did, I doubt he's around anymore. Everyone's left."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let me have one more look at..."
links.text: "Okay, let me have one more look at the monument..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure, whenever you're ready.""
links.text: "Sure, whenever you're ready."

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's the system. I did my bes..."
links.text: "Hey, it's the system. I did my best to support artists, employ people, give back to the community."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true philant..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true philanthropist." He smiles gently.

links.title: You: ""I really don't need to be judged l..."
links.text: "I really don't need to be judged like this, especially after the amount of tax I've paid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol."..."
links.text: "Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol." He looks around, as if looking for hidden taxation, then shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""The free market demands it.""
links.text: "The free market demands it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The doom crier waits to be swallowed by the bright sky, his cardboard omen flapping in the wind like live bait...

links.title: Empathy: "Demands *what*? Endless reconceptua..."
links.text: Demands *what*? Endless reconceptualization? The lives we lost? The charade?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, the free market demands somethi..."
links.text: No, the free market demands something much more PR-friendly than what Idiot Doom Spiral has done here.

links.title: You: ""Don't you think we should make the..."
links.text: "Don't you think we should make the most of the short time we all have left?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think anything. I'm just a..."
links.text: "I don't think anything. I'm just asking questions."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You've been through a catastrophe a..."
links.text: You've been through a catastrophe and still haven't reaped a *single* benefit from this doomspeak. Drop it already!

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "A white lie -- of course he has opi..."
links.text: A white lie -- of course he has opinions.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more question, if you don't mi..."
links.text: "One more question, if you don't mind -- was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""It's not what I wanted. This is al..."
links.text: "It's not what I wanted. This is all Idiot Doom Spiral's work."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The doom crier waits to be swallowed by the bright sky, his cardboard omen flapping in the wind like live bait...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good -- take no responsibility for..."
links.text: Good -- take no responsibility for this disaster. It was supposed to *promote* you, not make people fear you.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral ha..."
links.text: Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "It's far too soon. This portent is..."
links.text: It's far too soon. This portent is grossly inappropriate.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, even the street lamp."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, the thing with Idiot Doom Spiral..."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'd prefer silence.""
links.text: "Actually, I'd prefer silence."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut l..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut like a world-ending implosion.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The cop radio is buzzing on silent...."
links.text: The cop radio is buzzing on silent...

links.title: You: ""Well, it's not The End yet. Ask yo..."
links.text: "Well, it's not The End yet. Ask your questions while you can."

links.title: You: ""Thanks." (Keep staring at the monu..."
links.text: "Thanks." (Keep staring at the monument.)

links.title: You: ""Maybe a tribute to the deceased wo..."
links.text: "Maybe a tribute to the deceased would make more sense now..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods in woeful agreement then cl..."
links.text: He nods in woeful agreement then closes his eyes for half a beat. When he opens them, it's clear he has something to say to you...

links.title: You: "(Shout.) "Listen to your leader, pe..."
links.text: (Shout.) "Listen to your leader, people of the coast -- the worst is yet to come!"

links.title: You: "(Nod.)"
links.text: (Nod.)

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Your eyes glide over the horse, ove..."
links.text: Your eyes glide over the horse, over its patina green coat. Something about the mount's sad animal-eyes makes you pause...

links.title: You: "I've made it."
links.text: I've made it.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The thought rings hollow in your si..."
links.text: The thought rings hollow in your silent mind. It's even quieter on the roundabout, under the brilliant sun.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You can feel the lieutenant's still..."
links.text: You can feel the lieutenant's stillness next to you...

links.title: You: "Net worth, net worth, net worth......"
links.text: Net worth, net worth, net worth... At least I've got my net worth! Watch the numbers go by.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "A seagull lands on the monument, su..."
links.text: A seagull lands on the monument, surveying the town below. Then it takes off again.

links.title: Shivers: "A figure in a day dress, cuddled up..."
links.text: A figure in a day dress, cuddled up in an armchair... she looks up and smiles at you across the living room.

links.title: You: "It's fucking lonely at the top."
links.text: It's fucking lonely at the top.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The doom crier above seems to agree..."
links.text: The doom crier above seems to agree.

links.title: You: "She will come back."
links.text: She will come back.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Wind makes the cardboard omen swing..."
links.text: Wind makes the cardboard omen swing menacingly, like a pendulum ticking down to a dreaded epilogue...

links.title: You: "Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you g..."
links.text: Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you go?! Talk to me!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Savvy's here, watching the little *..."
links.text: Savvy's here, watching the little *fiasco* of the horseback monument. You should distance yourself from this project. Say it's your Personal Brand Strategist gone rogue.

links.title: Composure: "Yes, it's not very good for PR..."
links.text: Yes, it's not very good for PR...

links.title: Conceptualization: "'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral..."
links.text: 'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "Of course you're going to distance..."
links.text: Of course you're going to distance yourself from your misdeeds -- the lying, the conning, the exploitation...

links.title: Endurance: "No, you should own up to it, claim..."
links.text: No, you should own up to it, claim it as *yours*. Forget about the haters.

links.title: You: "A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful..."
links.text: A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a lo..."
links.text: Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Come on, we've stood here long enou..."
links.text: Come on, we've stood here long enough. And money doesn't sleep.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The doom crier towers above, mounte..."
links.text: The doom crier towers above, mounted on a horse. Numerous rods and ropes still hold the original reassemblage in place.

links.title: You: "Yes, let's get back to making money..."
links.text: Yes, let's get back to making money.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Spoken like a true hustler. We have..."
links.text: Spoken like a true hustler. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "Maybe it's an honest portrait of wh..."
links.text: Maybe it's an honest portrait of who I am and what I've done.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "An Apocalypse Cop? No. You're a hus..."
links.text: An Apocalypse Cop? No. You're a hustler -- and you've got a long way to go. Your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "It's very on brand. We can work wit..."
links.text: It's very on brand. We can work with it.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Maybe... But we still have a long w..."
links.text: Maybe... But we still have a long way to go -- your net worth is *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere in a hospital bed the lie..."
links.text: Somewhere in a hospital bed the lieutenant turns onto his side, feverish and exhausted...

links.title: You: "Was it worth it?"
links.text: Was it worth it?

links.title: You: "Go away, stupid thoughts."
links.text: Go away, stupid thoughts.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Your mind is silent, just like the..."
links.text: Your mind is silent, just like the roundabout under the brilliant sun.

dialogueTree.text: An apricot sceptre shines party-bright across the monument. Glitter balls dangle like severed heads below the eternal king of disco. It is unmistakably a vision of you in your prime -- a killer on the performance floor, icon for all.

links.text: "Doesn't feel right to party now, does it?" The lieutenant solemnly looks toward the plaza, then turns to you. "Are you at least happy with it?"

links.title: Composure: "Putting on a brave face and partyin..."
links.text: Putting on a brave face and partying as hard as possible is the best way to get through tough times.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Happy isn't the word. You can be *s..."
links.text: Happy isn't the word. You can be *satisfied* with a job well done. But the current mood doesn't invite any analogues to joy.

links.text: Not bad, not bad. It's just lacking some *objets de destruction*. Needs a ciggy or a half-drunk bottle. In fact, so do *you*.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The disco sovereign above seems to..."
links.text: The disco sovereign above seems to agree.

links.title: You: "She will come back."
links.text: She will come back.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "One of the lights flickers and aban..."
links.text: One of the lights flickers and abandons a part of the bronze figure to the murk, if only for a second...

links.title: You: "Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you g..."
links.text: Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you go?! Talk to me!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Savvy's here, watching the little *..."
links.text: Savvy's here, watching the little *fiasco* of the horseback monument. You should distance yourself from this project. Say it's your Personal Brand Strategist gone rogue.

links.title: Composure: "Yes, it's not very good for PR..."
links.text: Yes, it's not very good for PR...

links.title: Conceptualization: "'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral..."
links.text: 'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "Of course you're going to distance..."
links.text: Of course you're going to distance yourself from your misdeeds -- the lying, the conning, the exploitation...

links.title: Endurance: "No, you should own up to it, claim..."
links.text: No, you should own up to it, claim it as *yours*. Forget about the haters.

links.title: You: "A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful..."
links.text: A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a lo..."
links.text: Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Come on, we've stood here long enou..."
links.text: Come on, we've stood here long enough. And money doesn't sleep.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The disco danseur towers above, mou..."
links.text: The disco danseur towers above, mounted on a horse. Numerous rods and ropes still hold the original reassemblage in place.

links.title: You: "Yes, let's get back to making money..."
links.text: Yes, let's get back to making money.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Spoken like a true hustler. We have..."
links.text: Spoken like a true hustler. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "Maybe it's an honest portrait of wh..."
links.text: Maybe it's an honest portrait of who I am and what I've done.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "A Superstar Cop? No. You're a hustl..."
links.text: A Superstar Cop? No. You're a hustler -- and you've got a long way to go. Your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "It's very on brand. We can work wit..."
links.text: It's very on brand. We can work with it.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Maybe... But we still have a long w..."
links.text: Maybe... But we still have a long way to go -- your net worth is *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.text: Somewhere in a hospital bed the lieutenant turns onto his side, feverish and exhausted...

links.title: You: "Was it worth it?"
links.text: Was it worth it?

links.title: You: "Go away, stupid thoughts."
links.text: Go away, stupid thoughts.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Your mind is silent, just like the..."
links.text: Your mind is silent, just like the roundabout under the brilliant sun.

dialogueTree.title: Horseback Monument: "Petal wreaths cluster the monument..."
dialogueTree.text: Petal wreaths cluster the monument in gloves of colour. Nectar scents the air and calls attention to the blossom. Atop it all sits a figure, veiled and black, sorrowful due to an unknown loss.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A fitting testament to the lives l..."
links.text: "A fitting testament to the lives lost," the lieutenant says as he turns toward the plaza. He holds one hand against his chest, the other is outstretched -- palm flat to the air.

links.title: Composure: "That's a variation of the Stations..."
links.text: That's a variation of the Stations of the Breath. It's used when the body of the deceased is not available to hold a hand against.

links.title: Suggestion: "No need to act out of line here. It..."
links.text: No need to act out of line here. It may even be wise to bow your head out of respect.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Why dwell on dead tissue? *Your* bo..."
links.text: Why dwell on dead tissue? *Your* body survived the battle. *Your* muscles proved the mightier. Celebrate the living instead.

links.title: You: "(Perform the Stations of the Breath..."
links.text: (Perform the Stations of the Breath.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He holds the position for two secon..."
links.text: He holds the position for two seconds, then relaxes, turning to face you...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, I have a few questions..."
links.text: "Detective, I have a few questions if you don't mind..."

links.title: You: ""About what?""
links.text: "About what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""About this... pursuit of wealth......"
links.text: "About this... pursuit of wealth... pursuit of recognition." He looks up, trying to find a name for your actions.

links.title: You: ""No, I don't mind.""
links.text: "No, I don't mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods, eyes still on the veiled a..."
links.text: He nods, eyes still on the veiled apparition above, on the troves and troves of flowers below, their sickly sweet scent pungent in the cold air.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why did you do it?""
links.text: "Why did you do it?"

links.title: Shivers: "A figure in a day dress, cuddled up..."
links.text: A figure in a day dress, cuddled up in an armchair... she looks up and smiles at you across the living room.

links.title: You: ""To win her back.""
links.text: "To win her back."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who?" The lieutenant meets your ey..."
links.text: "Who?" The lieutenant meets your eyes with a questioning glance -- then looks up again.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, who are you talking about?"
links.text: Yes, who are you talking about?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's talking about pussy. Our guy's..."
links.text: He's talking about pussy. Our guy's gonna be *swimming* in it now that he's loaded!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Never mind. Another question -- wa..."
links.text: "Never mind. Another question -- was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""I wanted better for myself.""
links.text: "I wanted better for myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The penumbral griever is a silhouette against the bright sky, the flowers lifting him in requiem starting to wilt...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Honest. Maybe even *too* honest......"
links.text: Honest. Maybe even *too* honest... Didn't we talk about giving back to the community?

links.title: Endurance: "Nothing wrong with raw ambition."
links.text: Nothing wrong with raw ambition.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And was it all worth it?""
links.text: "And was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You managed to gather quite a fort..."
links.text: "You managed to gather quite a fortune, kicked off by underpaying a young artist..."

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying......"
links.text: And don't forget about the lying... or the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying..."
links.text: And don't forget about the lying...

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the way you..."
links.text: And don't forget about the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You *had to* pay her so little, oth..."
links.text: You *had to* pay her so little, otherwise you wouldn't have made any profit -- and if you don't make a profit, you don't have money to invest!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The lieutenant speaks as if you're..."
links.text: The lieutenant speaks as if you're *rich* -- a common misconception -- especially if you count the tax. No, we've got a long way to go before we can feel financially comfortable. The hustle never stops!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? But you paid the highe..."
links.text: Underpaying? But you paid the highest possible price!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? You paid according to..."
links.text: Underpaying? You paid according to the market -- not too much, not too little...

links.title: You: ""100% worth it. I'd do it all over..."
links.text: "100% worth it. I'd do it all over again -- but this time with more *profit*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true busines..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true businessman." He smiles gently.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, shall we? We still have s..."
links.text: "Alright, shall we? We still have some things left to do before we can go home."

links.title: You: ""Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom..."
links.text: "Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom Spiral first."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think we have time for tha..."
links.text: "I don't think we have time for that. And even if we did, I doubt he's around anymore. Everyone's left."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let me have one more look at..."
links.text: "Okay, let me have one more look at the monument..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure, whenever you're ready.""
links.text: "Sure, whenever you're ready."

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's the system. I did my bes..."
links.text: "Hey, it's the system. I did my best to support artists, employ people, give back to the community."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true philant..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true philanthropist." He smiles gently.

links.title: You: ""I really don't need to be judged l..."
links.text: "I really don't need to be judged like this, especially after the amount of tax I've paid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol."..."
links.text: "Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol." He looks around, as if looking for hidden taxation, then shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""The free market demands it.""
links.text: "The free market demands it."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good -- take no responsibility over..."
links.text: Good -- take no responsibility over this disaster. It was supposed to *promote* you, not mock you for your failings.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral ha..."
links.text: Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.text: It fits the day. Anything else would be grossly inappropriate.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, even the street lamp."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, the thing with Idiot Doom Spiral..."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'd prefer silence.""
links.text: "Actually, I'd prefer silence."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut l..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut like a lily in the afternoon.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The cop radio is buzzing on silent...."
links.text: The cop radio is buzzing on silent...

links.title: You: ""Sorry. I don't know what got into..."
links.text: "Sorry. I don't know what got into me. Ask your questions."

links.title: You: ""Thanks." (Keep staring at the monu..."

links.title: You: ""Mhm." (Bow your head.)"
links.text: "Mhm." (Bow your head.)

links.title: You: ""It's a shame we can't all know the..."

links.title: You: "I've made it."
links.text: I've made it.

links.text: The thought rings hollow in your silent mind. It's even quieter on the roundabout, under the brilliant sun.

links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The tickets remain true to their duty -- except for a few that have come unstuck, now assigned to brushing dirt from the asphalt below...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good -- take no responsibility over..."
links.text: Good -- take no responsibility over this disaster. It was supposed to *promote* you, not bore people.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral ha..."
links.text: Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "People are trying to mourn and all..."
links.text: People are trying to mourn and all they can hear are those little tickets flapping in their ears.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, even the street lamp."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, the thing with Idiot Doom Spiral..."

links.title: You: ""Actually, I'd prefer silence.""
links.text: "Actually, I'd prefer silence."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut l..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut like a pocket book.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "The cop radio is buzzing on silent...."
links.text: The cop radio is buzzing on silent...

links.title: You: ""Khm, that was an inappropriate jok..."
links.text: "Khm, that was an inappropriate joke. Ask your questions."

links.title: You: ""Thanks." (Keep staring at the monu..."
links.text: "Thanks." (Keep staring at the monument.)

links.title: You: ""Makes you proud to be part of the..."
links.text: "Makes you proud to be part of the RCM."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods in dutiful agreement then c..."
links.text: He nods in dutiful agreement then closes his eyes for half a beat. When he opens them, it's clear he has something to say to you...

links.title: You: ""Gives me the itch to write a ticke..."
links.text: "Gives me the itch to write a ticket myself, actually."

links.title: You: "(Groan and hold your wound.)"
links.text: (Groan and hold your wound.)

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Your eyes glide over the horse, ove..."
links.text: Your eyes glide over the horse, over its patina green coat. Something about the mount's sad animal-eyes makes you pause...

links.title: You: "I've made it."
links.text: I've made it.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The thought rings hollow in your si..."
links.text: The thought rings hollow in your silent mind. It's even quieter on the roundabout, under the brilliant sun.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You can feel the lieutenant's still..."
links.text: You can feel the lieutenant's stillness next to you...

links.title: You: "Net worth, net worth, net worth......"
links.text: Net worth, net worth, net worth... At least I've got my net worth! Watch the numbers go by.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "A seagull lands on the monument, su..."
links.text: A seagull lands on the monument, surveying the town below. Then it takes off again.

links.title: Shivers: "A figure in a day dress, cuddled up..."
links.text: A figure in a day dress, cuddled up in an armchair... she looks up and smiles at you across the living room.

links.title: You: "It's fucking lonely at the top."
links.text: It's fucking lonely at the top.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The ticket creature above seems to..."
links.text: The ticket creature above seems to agree.

links.title: You: "She will come back."
links.text: She will come back.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Wind takes some of the tickets acro..."
links.text: Wind takes some of the tickets across the pavement, littering the streets with paper police officers...

links.title: You: "Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you g..."
links.text: Savvy, hey Savvy... where did you go?! Talk to me!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Savvy's here, watching the little *..."
links.text: Savvy's here, watching the little *fiasco* of the horseback monument. You should distance yourself from this project. Say it's your Personal Brand Strategist gone rogue.

links.title: Composure: "Yes, it's not very good for PR..."
links.text: Yes, it's not very good for PR...

links.title: Conceptualization: "'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral..."
links.text: 'Gone rogue'? No, Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "Of course you're going to distance..."
links.text: Of course you're going to distance yourself from your misdeeds -- the lying, the conning, the exploitation...

links.title: Endurance: "No, you should own up to it, claim..."
links.text: No, you should own up to it, claim it as *yours*. Forget about the haters.

links.title: You: "A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful..."
links.text: A fiasco?! No, it's beautiful...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a lo..."
links.text: Beauty doesn't cut it. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Come on, we've stood here long enou..."
links.text: Come on, we've stood here long enough. And money doesn't sleep.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "The ticket creature towers above, m..."
links.text: The ticket creature towers above, mounted on a horse. Numerous rods and ropes still hold the original reassemblage in place.

links.title: You: "Yes, let's get back to making money..."
links.text: Yes, let's get back to making money.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Spoken like a true hustler. We have..."
links.text: Spoken like a true hustler. We have a long way to go -- your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "Maybe it's an honest portrait of wh..."
links.text: Maybe it's an honest portrait of who I am and what I've done.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "A Boring Cop? No. You're a hustler..."
links.text: A Boring Cop? No. You're a hustler -- and you've got a long way to go. Your net worth is still *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: You: "It's very on brand. We can work wit..."
links.text: It's very on brand. We can work with it.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Maybe... But we still have a long w..."
links.text: Maybe... But we still have a long way to go -- your net worth is *nothing* if you factor in the tax!

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Somewhere in a hospital bed the lie..."
links.text: Somewhere in a hospital bed the lieutenant turns onto his side, feverish and exhausted...

links.title: You: "Was it worth it?"
links.text: Was it worth it?

links.title: You: "Go away, stupid thoughts."
links.text: Go away, stupid thoughts.

links.title: Horseback Monument: "Your mind is silent, just like the..."
links.text: Your mind is silent, just like the roundabout under the brilliant sun.

dialogueTree.title: Horseback Monument: "A bright chromatic splash lounges a..."
dialogueTree.text: A bright chromatic splash lounges across the surface of the monument. It's not obvious if the paint has any intentional form or if it being there in the first place is statement enough.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant considers the restor..."
links.text: The lieutenant considers the restoration for a few seconds. "Am I not seeing something here? There's not much to it."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Oh yes, much is to be discussed at..."
links.text: Oh yes, much is to be discussed at length here. The claboussure breaks up the lines of the original bronze piece, setting up an act of rebellion for us all to follow. It is an anarcho-modern calling -- destruction of the past, cause for the future.

links.title: Endurance: "Nothing to see here but disrespect...."
links.text: Nothing to see here but disrespect. The old figure will outlive this pathetic lick of paint. The past always endures.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "This splash was obviously made with..."
links.text: This splash was obviously made with a clumsy hand. Perhaps it adds to the artistry?

links.title: You: ""It's setting a precedent. We must..."
links.text: "It's setting a precedent. We must overwrite the harms of the past with the glory of the future."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods in hopes of humouring you t..."
links.text: He nods in hopes of humouring you then closes his eyes for half a beat. When he opens them, it's clear he has something to say to you...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Detective, I have a few questions..."
links.text: "Detective, I have a few questions if you don't mind..."

links.title: You: ""About what?""
links.text: "About what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""About this... pursuit of wealth......"
links.text: "About this... pursuit of wealth... pursuit of recognition." He looks up, trying to find a name for your actions.

links.title: You: ""No, I don't mind.""
links.text: "No, I don't mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods, eyes still on the defaced..."
links.text: He nods, eyes still on the defaced statue above, on the deviant smear delivering a florid punch to its dreary surroundings.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why did you do it?""
links.text: "Why did you do it?"

links.title: Shivers: "A figure in a day dress, cuddled up..."
links.text: A figure in a day dress, cuddled up in an armchair... she looks up and smiles at you across the living room.

links.title: You: ""To win her back.""
links.text: "To win her back."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Who?" The lieutenant meets your ey..."
links.text: "Who?" The lieutenant meets your eyes with a questioning glance -- then looks up again.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, who are you talking about?"
links.text: Yes, who are you talking about?

links.title: Electrochemistry: "He's talking about pussy. Our guy's..."
links.text: He's talking about pussy. Our guy's gonna be *swimming* in it now that he's loaded!

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Never mind. Another question -- wa..."
links.text: "Never mind. Another question -- was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""I wanted better for myself.""
links.text: "I wanted better for myself."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The formless complexion glows at the centre, while the old architecture surrounding it groans in the heat with looming irrelevance...

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Honest. Maybe even *too* honest......"
links.text: Honest. Maybe even *too* honest... Didn't we talk about giving back to the community?

links.title: Endurance: "Nothing wrong with raw ambition."
links.text: Nothing wrong with raw ambition.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""And was it all worth it?""
links.text: "And was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""What are you talking about?""
links.text: "What are you talking about?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You managed to gather quite a fort..."
links.text: "You managed to gather quite a fortune, kicked off by underpaying a young artist..."

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying......"
links.text: And don't forget about the lying... or the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the lying..."
links.text: And don't forget about the lying...

links.title: Empathy: "And don't forget about the way you..."
links.text: And don't forget about the way you conned an honest pawnshop owner.

links.title: Rhetoric: "You *had to* pay her so little, oth..."
links.text: You *had to* pay her so little, otherwise you wouldn't have made any profit -- and if you don't make a profit, you don't have money to invest!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "The lieutenant speaks as if you're..."
links.text: The lieutenant speaks as if you're *rich* -- a common misconception -- especially if you count the tax. No, we've got a long way to go before we can feel financially comfortable. The hustle never stops!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? But you paid the highe..."
links.text: Underpaying? But you paid the highest possible price!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Underpaying? You paid according to..."
links.text: Underpaying? You paid according to the market -- not too much, not too little...

links.title: You: ""100% worth it. I'd do it all over..."
links.text: "100% worth it. I'd do it all over again -- but this time with more *profit*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true busines..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true businessman." He smiles gently.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Alright, shall we? We still have s..."
links.text: "Alright, shall we? We still have some things left to do before we can go home."

links.title: You: ""Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom..."
links.text: "Wait, I want to talk to Idiot Doom Spiral first."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think we have time for tha..."
links.text: "I don't think we have time for that. And even if we did, I doubt he's around anymore. Everyone's left."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let me have one more look at..."
links.text: "Okay, let me have one more look at the monument..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Sure, whenever you're ready.""
links.text: "Sure, whenever you're ready."

links.title: You: ""Hey, it's the system. I did my bes..."
links.text: "Hey, it's the system. I did my best to support artists, employ people, give back to the community."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah yes. Spoken like a true philant..."
links.text: "Ah yes. Spoken like a true philanthropist." He smiles gently.

links.title: You: ""I really don't need to be judged l..."
links.text: "I really don't need to be judged like this, especially after the amount of tax I've paid."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol."..."
links.text: "Tax? What tax? We're in Revachol." He looks around, as if looking for hidden taxation, then shakes his head.

links.title: You: ""The free market demands it.""
links.text: "The free market demands it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. The roundabout is quiet, a..."
links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The formless complexion glows at the centre, while the old architecture surrounding it groans in the heat with looming irrelevance...

links.title: Empathy: "Demands *what*? Endless reconceptua..."
links.text: Demands *what*? Endless reconceptualization? The lives we lost? The charade?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "No, the free market demands somethi..."
links.text: No, the free market demands something less niche than what Idiot Doom Spiral has done here.

links.title: You: ""Why do you think we do anything? I..."
links.text: "Why do you think we do anything? It's the question behind all art."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think anything. I'm just a..."
links.text: "I don't think anything. I'm just asking questions."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Geez, you artsy types are unbearabl..."
links.text: Geez, you artsy types are unbearable. No wonder you struggle to make your millions...

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "A white lie -- of course he has opi..."
links.text: A white lie -- of course he has opinions.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""One more question, if you don't mi..."
links.text: "One more question, if you don't mind -- was it all worth it?"

links.title: You: ""It's not what I wanted. This is al..."
links.text: "It's not what I wanted. This is all Idiot Doom Spiral's work."

links.text: He nods. The roundabout is quiet, almost eerily so under the brilliant sunlight. The formless complexion glows at the centre, while the old architecture surrounding it groans in the heat with looming irrelevance...

links.text: Don't you see? Idiot Doom Spiral has finally achieved something *remarkable*.

links.title: Empathy: "Its colour really doesn't fit in wi..."
links.text: Its colour really doesn't fit in with the mood right now. People are trying to *mourn*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, even the street lamp."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But was it all worth it? Everythin..."
links.text: "But was it all worth it? Everything that came before -- Cindy, the stocks, the thing with Idiot Doom Spiral..."

links.text: "Actually, I'd prefer silence."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut l..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant snaps shut like a lid on a paint tin.

links.text: The cop radio is buzzing on silent...

links.text: "Relax, Kim. I'm just playing. Ask your questions."

links.text: "Thanks." (Keep staring at the monument.)

links.title: You: ""What you're seeing here is a total..."
links.text: "What you're seeing here is a total lack of appreciation for both art *and* history."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Khm," the lieutenant clears his th..."
links.text: "Khm," the lieutenant clears his throat, keen to move on.

links.title: You: ""That's what you get when you commi..."
links.text: "That's what you get when you commission a drunk, I guess."

links.title: You: ""Even *I'm* not sure what that's su..."
